title: server problem?
body: in game whole team dc's briefly with 7k ping, upon resumption it says in chat some one had unpaused the game. then it dc'd again and i can't login in or anything. is there a server problem?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It could just be that a lot of people in that game were having connection issues all at the same time, unrelated to the servers. Though yeah, it's probably the servers.

What ISP are you with?
